#TipOftheWeek 30
#PlayaSafeHoli
The time of the year has arrived when vibrant #colours fill the atmosphere.However, the risk of novel #COVID19  #infection is not over yet.The #nationwide #vaccine drive is in place, but still, safety should be the top priority this #Holi
